description:
Learn how to make authentic Mexican tomato and tomatillo salsa that you can eat and serve like you are in the heart of Mexico. From Spicy to mild, bursting with flavor. This will teach you fundamental and basic salsa recipes.

I show you everything that you need to know about making family recipes from Mexico.

This course is for anyone that wants to have delicious Mexican Salsa.

This is not for anyone that already knows how to make salsa for all occasions.
title: Authentic Mexican Salsa's, Fresh Homemade And Delicious
